(Well, Plintissa and co has BEEN set on enemy.  The ship would open fire on 
them.  Secondly, Plintissa basically declared war when she claimed she would 
kill all the Maximals.  Non-Maximal members can't just walk into the Ark.  
It's moding.  Even if you area  Maximal, you aren't part of the Maximal 
faction.  I could have a Maximal guy in the Alliance, and he couldn't walk 
into the Ark)
